column2: CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME (USD $) In Thousands, except Per Share data, unless otherwise specified
CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME (USD $) In Thousands, except Per Share data, unless otherwise specified
CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF COMPREHENSIVE INCOME [Abstract]
Gain on sale of property, plant & equipment and businesses, net
Earnings (loss) from continuing operations before income taxes
Total provision for (benefit from) income taxes
Earnings (loss) on discontinued operations, net of income taxes (Note 2)
Other comprehensive income (loss), net of tax
Reclassification adjustment for cash flow hedges
Adjustment for funded status of benefit plans
Amortization of actuarial loss and prior service cost for benefit plans
